# Canada at the FIFA World Cup

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Jump to navigation Jump to search

This is a **record of[Canada](/wiki/Canada_men%27s_national_soccer_team
"Canada men's national soccer team")'s results at the [FIFA World
Cup](/wiki/FIFA_World_Cup "FIFA World Cup")**. Canada has appeared in the FIFA
World Cup on one occasion, which was in [1986](/wiki/1986_FIFA_World_Cup "1986
FIFA World Cup").[1][2][3][4]

## Contents

[hide]

  * 2 1986 FIFA World Cup

  * 3 References
